snippet: The San Antonio company reported net income of $10.5 million, or 18 cents per unit, in its first full quarter as a publicly traded company.
lead_paragraph: The San Antonio company reported net income of $10.5 million, or 18 cents per unit, in its first full quarter as a publicly traded company.

headline.main: Valero Blames Harsh Winter for 28 Percent Drop in Income
headline.print_headline: Valero Blames Harsh Winter For 28 Percent Drop In Income
